titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Courthouse in Denver, Colorado, as the "Byron White Federal Courthouse", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5551-5552)

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Baucus without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 350.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

bill.summary: 4/22/1993--Introduced. South Carolina National Heritage Corridor Act of 1995 - Establishes: (1) the South Carolina National Heritage Corridor in the State of South Carolina; and (2) the South Carolina National Heritage Corridor Commission to assist Federal, State, and local authorities and the private sector in developing and implementing an integrated management action plan for the Corridor. Authorizes appropriations.
